DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect GINST human semen . The study pilot study , design open-label , prospective randomize clinical trial use GINST either 500mg/capsule ( panax ginseng 0.96g/day ) 1000mg/capsule ( panax ginseng 1.92g/day ) , two capsule , three time day 12 week . GINST ( Ilhwa , Republic Korea ) dietary supplement capsule , make 6 year-old Korean red ginseng ( Panax ginseng ) . Expected participant male partner female patient visit infertility clinic Severance hospital , whose total motile sperm count 0.5x106 semen analysis use computer aid sperm analyzer ( CASA ) . Semen analysis , blood test , questionaires plan perform 2 time , initial visit 12weeks GINST treatment . Semen analysis reveal ejaculated volume , sperm count , motility , morphology , total leukocyte count , total motile sperm count , analysis include sperm chromatin assessment examine quality sperm malondialdehyde ( MDA ) analysis seminal fluid ass oxidative stress perform . Blood test do include serum follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) , luteinizing hormone ( LH ) , total free testosterone . Quality life , sexual performance take GINST evaluate use questionaires .
DOC.criteria: 1. partner female patient visit infertility clinic chief complaint infertility . 2 . ≥0.5x106 total motile sperm count screen semen analysis . 1 . Those chronic , systemic disease endocrinologic disorder . 2 . Patients hypertension ( systolic blood pressure ≥ 140mmHg , diastolic blood pressure ≥ 90mmHg ) 3 . Patients undergone chemotherapy due malignancy 4 . Patient history take testosterone anti androgen agent within 1 month . 5 . Patient retrieve sperm surgically
